summary: The document is an identification form related to the JFK assassination system, detailing a local agency check on Manuel Marti, also known as Manuel Adrian Sotomayor-Badillo, conducted by the INSCOM/CSF. It includes an agent's report from the San Juan Field Office, Federal Bureau of Investigation, which found no records on Marti, and notes a name change in 1963. The document is marked as 'RELEASED WITH DELETIONS' and was last reviewed on 03/07/95.
key_findings: The document pertains to a local agency check on Manuel Marti in relation to the JFK assassination system.
No records were found on Manuel Marti in the San Juan Field Office, FBI.
Marti's name was changed on 5 March 1963, as noted in an Agent Report.
The document was classified as 'UNCLASSIFIED' and released with deletions.
